message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $85.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $87.50.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I would like to counter with an offer of $86.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob! I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to sell it to you for $88.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. I would like to counter with an offer of $87.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob! I'm still willing to work with you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $89.
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I believe we can reach a better agreement. I would like to counter with an offer of $88.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob! I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to sell it to you for $89.50.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your persistence in negotiating. I would like to counter with an offer of $89.
